name: Zombie Wrangling
description:
Set during the infamous zombie outbreak of 1875, play as the humble cowboy who helped to find a cure for the zombie virus by rounding up test subjects for his town's doctor.

Controls -

  • Left/A, Right/D, Up/W, Down/S - movement
  • Left click - throw a Lasso, hold to increase loop size (Though keep in mind that the doctor will not let you use the lasso near his "containment facility" in case you should go around breaking his stuff)

Gameplay -

Zombies will spawn off to the right. Head out to them, catch them in your lasso, then drag them back to the "containment facility".

Once you have 100 zombies in your facility, the doctor will be able to create a cure and you will have saved humanity!

Get attacked by three zombies however and you will die, dooming all of humankind.
